content.title: Calvary Kids Home
content.heading: Home
content.p: Calvary Kids' mission is to reach children and parents, both here at Calvary Chapel Austin and out in the world beyond, with the love of God, through the teaching of His Word and through service to them.
Our mission can be summed up by the acronym K.I.D.S.:

Please make yourself at home as you explore the Calvary Kids ministry. Dive right in, using the starfish navigation buttons found at the top and bottom of each page. If you have questions or comments as you explore our ministry, please contact:

Donna Cano
Children's Ministry Director
Calvary Chapel of Austin
9414 Parkfield Drive
Austin, Texas 78758
Phone: 512.719.4667
Email: donna@calvaryaustin.org
Oh, and one more thing - don't forget your scuba gear!
